channel.title: world of warcraft on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in world of warcraft on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Game Night
item.description: Last night was my weekly night to play games with my friend Vinny. I have been playing Enemy Territory every Wednesday night since last Summer with a few cancellations here and there. Earlier this year Vinny convinced me to try World of Warcraft, a very addictive online multiplayer game. I was hooked from the start but not being able to “dedicate” to more than a couple of hours a week I eventually lost interest.
